trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all workflow message filters.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The workflow designer provides a `Strategy` design pattern to create replaceable message filter objects to handle events.

Derive from the WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter class to create message filters that can respond to workflow designer events, such as drag operations, layout and paint operations, and other designer events.

To add a custom message filter to the message filters chain, call the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A> on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> or override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IWorkflowRootDesigner.MessageFilters%2A> virtual property on the custom root activity and add the custom message filter to the collection returned from the base class.
When implemented in a derived class, initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`.

When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> references.
This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
> [!NOTE] > `Dispose` can be called multiple times by other objects.
When overriding `Dispose(Boolean)`, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to `Dispose`.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to implement `Dispose(Boolean)`, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

[!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `Dispose` and `Finalize`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Attempts to free resources by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose(false)" name="Dispose(false)" href=""></xref> before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
This method cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`.
Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup.
Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> with the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.

You can associate message filters with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> to capture messages that occur from user interaction, such as mouse events, keyboard events, paint and layout events.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.

Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that describes the context of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> contains information about the area and the context of the area hit, including any designers hit and the area on the designer hit.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> object that contains information about the context of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
Occurs when the mouse button is released above an object during a drag operation.
OnDragDrop occurs when the mouse button is released above an object during a drag operation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
OnDragEnter occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
OnDragLeave occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the mouse pointer moves within the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
OnDragOver occurs when the mouse pointer moves within the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs during a drag operation.
OnGiveFeedback occurs when a drag operation is started.
OnGiveFeedback allows the source of a drag operation to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer to give you visual feedback during a drag operation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when a key is pressed.
OnKeyDown occurs when a key is pressed when a specific object has focus.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when a key is released.
OnKeyUp occurs when a key is released when a specific object has focus.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when child objects should be repositioned.
OnLayout occurs when child objects should be repositioned within the parent container.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
Occurs when the items selected by dragging the mouse changes.
OnMouseCaptureChanged occurs when the items selected by dragging the mouse changes.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when you double-click the mouse.
OnMouseDoubleClick occurs when you double-click the mouse.
The double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the operating system.
You can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that is considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when a mouse button is clicked.
OnMouseDown occurs when a mouse button is clicked.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an object.
OnMouseEnter occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an object.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the mouse pointer pauses above an object.
OnMouseHover occurs when the mouse pointer hovers above an object.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of an object.
OnMouseLeave occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of an object.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the mouse pointer moves while within the bounds of an object.
OnMouseMove occurs when the mouse pointer moves while within the bounds of an object.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the mouse button is released.
OnMouseUp occurs when you release a mouse button.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the mouse wheel moves.
OnMouseWheel occurs when the mouse wheel moves.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when a paint message is received.
OnPaint occurs when a paint message is received.
Use the parameters passed to OnPaint to determine the area to be painted, the theme used, and additional information about the event passed in the `PaintEventArgs`.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that describes the area to be painted.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> used to obtain information about the theme.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the workflow should repaint its adornments.
`OnPaintWorkflowAdornments` occurs when the workflow should repaint its adornments.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_PaintEventArgs" name="PaintEventArgs" href=""></xref> that contains information about the event.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rectangle" name="Rectangle" href=""></xref> that describes the area to be painted.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_AmbientTheme" name="AmbientTheme" href=""></xref> used to obtain information about the theme.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs during a drag operation.
`OnQueryContinueDrag` occurs during a drag operation.
The `OnQueryContinueDrag` event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when a user scrolls in a workflow designer.
OnScroll occurs when you use a scroll bar on a designer to scroll up, down, left, or right.
Unless overridden in a derived class, OnScroll always returns `false`.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> that the user scrolled.
The position of the scroll bar.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the workflow should show a context menu.
OnShowContextMenu occurs when the workflow should show a context menu.
The point at which to the context menu is shown.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the theme of the workflow changes.
OnThemeChange occurs when you make changes to the workflow theme.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
A message filter responds to events in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
The message filter is associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>.

When an event occurs in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> it passes the message on to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
Occurs when a raw Win32 message must be processed.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> can receive raw Win32 messages from the operating system.
Messages forward to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Message" name="Message" href=""></xref> to handle.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
